name: Save My Phone
description:
A simple game about trying to get the most out of your phones battery life.

You are stuck on a couch and need to charge your phone but you are too lazy to get up and go to the charger and so you turn on and off random settings on the phone while avoid stubbing your toe on random objects.

use a and d to move left and right or use a controller

Watch your battery life and make sure it dosn't hit zero by collecting items that may hurt, help or do both to you.

airplane: turns you into invincible airplane for a few seconds 
battery saver: decreases life consumption
ultra battery saver: decreases battery consumption even more
cloud: lose 2 life due to really long update
settings: updates system giving more speed and consumes battery due to update
app: same as settings except smaller time and speed
portable battery: restores 5 life
objects: slow you down and decrease life by 1
